sourcing.instructions: Ce: Chemical supply companies, Ru: Precious metal suppliers, Tm: Rare earth metal suppliers, Y: Chemical supply companies
steps: Ce: Chemical supply companies, Ru: Precious metal suppliers, Tm: Rare earth metal suppliers, Y: Chemical supply companies
1. Weigh out Ce (12.0 g), Ru (18.0 g), Tm (6.0 g), and Y (4.0 g) separately.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out Ce (12.0 g), Ru (18.0 g), Tm (6.0 g), and Y (4.0 g) separately.

steps: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).

steps: 1. Remove the sample from the crucible carefully to avoid breakage.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the sample from the crucible carefully to avoid breakage.
